block_info.description: `BlockInfo` is the object we store in the storage. It consists of the block as well as the execution result of this block.

frozen_subtree_roots.description: Frozen subtree roots of this accumulator.

items.description: Output value of our hash function. Intentionally opaque for safety and modularity.

num_nodes.description: The total number of nodes in this accumulator.

schema.title: HashValue
schema.description: Output value of our hash function. Intentionally opaque for safety and modularity.

items.description: Output value of our hash function. Intentionally opaque for safety and modularity.

authenticator.description: Public key and signature to authenticate

public_key.description: Vector of public keys in the multi-key Ed25519 structure along with the threshold.

signature.description:
Vector of the multi-key signatures along with a 32bit [u8; 4] bitmap required to map signatures with their corresponding public keys.

Note that bits are read from left to right. For instance, in the following bitmap [0b0001_0000, 0b0000_0000, 0b0000_0000, 0b0000_0001], the 3rd and 31st positions are set.

author.description: A struct that represents an account address.

author_auth_key.description: A struct that represents an account authentication key. An account's address is the last 16 bytes of authentication key used to create it

schema.title: HashValue
schema.description: Output value of our hash function. Intentionally opaque for safety and modularity.

block_hash.description: Output value of our hash function. Intentionally opaque for safety and modularity.

event_root_hash.description: The root hash of Merkle Accumulator storing all events emitted during this transaction.

state_root_hash.description: The root hash of Sparse Merkle Tree describing the world state at the end of this transaction.

status.description: The vm status. If it is not `Executed`, this will provide the general error class. Execution failures and Move abort's receive more detailed information. But other errors are generally categorized with no status code or other information

location.description: An `AbortLocation` specifies where a Move program `abort` occurred, either in a function in a module, or in a script

anyOf.description: Indicates `abort` occurred in the specified module

Module.description: Represents the initial key into global storage where we first index by the address, and then the struct tag

address.description: A struct that represents an account address.

name.description:
An owned identifier.

For more details, see the module level documentation.
